title: Outdoor adventure in Hellasgården
description: Spend some time in the beautiful Swedish nature. At Hellasgården you can go for a walk, rent a canoe or visit the sauna! Read more at: hellasgarden.se/en

title: Climbing at Klättercentret in Telefonplan
description: Do you want to reach new heights? Challenge yourself to go climb at Klättecentret today! Read more at: klattercentret.se

title: Climbing at Klättercentret in Solna
description: Do you want to reach new heights? Challenge yourself to go climb at Klättercentret today! Read more at: klattercentret.se

title: Flottsbro Downhill Cars
description: Who says downhill cars are for kids? Treat. yo. self! Read more at: flottsbro.se/fdc

title: SMC Gokart
description: Live your secret dream of being a race car driver for the day, drive a Gokart! Read more at: smcgokart.se

title: Gokart Stockholm
description: Live your secret dream of being a race car driver for the day, drive a Gokart! Read more at: gokartstockholm.se

title: Bodyflight
description: Have you ever been jealous of birds? Try bodyflight! Show those suckers who's the levitating master! Read more at: bodyflight.se

title: Eriksdalsbadet waterpark
description: Go explore Eriksdalsbadet's waterpark! Here you can swim outside, even in the winter... Read more at: bit.ly/2e4cwiY

title: Questrooms Sankt Eriksgatan
description: Become Sherlock Holmes (or a detective of your choice) and try to solve a mystery in real life. Read more at: bit.ly/2egCxYp

title: Questrooms Kocksgatan
description: Become Sherlock Holmes (or a detective of your choice) and try to solve a mystery in real life. Read more at: bit.ly/2egCxYp

title: Frisbee golf
description: Can't decide if you want to play frisbee or golf? Why not do both at the same time? Read more at: discgolfpark.com

title: Vespa time!
description: Screw walking! Why not try to explore Stockholm in a different way? Rent a scooter at Vespa Stockholm! Read more at: bit.ly/2egzfEN

title: Go skiing!
description: Embrace the cold snow and the darkness that covers Sweden for most of the year. There is nowhere to hide anyway. Go skiing at Hammarbybacken! Read more at: bit.ly/2e4aeAG

title: Go for a walk on Djurgården
description: Djurgården is beautiful all year around, and there is lots to explore. Find remnants of old times and go for a nice cup of tea in one of the island's many restaurants when you need to rest your feet. Read more at: bit.ly/2dx2aFj

title: Go skating or skateboarding in Högdalen
description: In the mood for some radical sports? Try this amazing skatepark then! Read more at: bit.ly/2ei7C1C

title: Kajak at Långholmen
description: If you like water, landscapes and exercising, kajak is the right choice! Read more at: bit.ly/2e4a4cC

title: Kajak at Vinterviken
description: If you like water, landscapes and exercising, kajak is the right choice! Read more at: soderkajak.se

title: Padel at PDL Center
description: If you like tennis and squash, this will be fun! Read more at: pdlcenter.se

title: Tom Tits Experiment
description: Become a mad scientist and try all kinds of crazy experiments! Read more at: tomtit.se/english

title: Junibacken
description: Who doesn't like the fantastic world of Astrid Lindgren? Join this amazing journey! Read more at: junibacken.se/en

title: Cosmonova
description: A 3D experience that will blow your mind! Read more at: bit.ly/2edMXJ6

title: Tensta Parkour
description: Ready to show your Parkour moves? You'd better! Read more at: bit.ly/2edrj92

title: Delta Force Paintball
description: It's war time! Why don't you have fun with your friends playing paintball? Read more at: deltaforcepaintball.se

description: It's war time! Why don't you have fun with your friends playing paintball? Read more at: stockholmpaintball.se

title: Sätraskogens naturreservat
description: If you like nature, there's a nice path from Sätraskogen to Liljeholmen. Leave your lazyness at home! Read more at: bit.ly/2ei9xDk

title: Judarskogen
description: Judarskogen is a great suggestion for nature lovers. You'll love it! Read more at: bit.ly/2eiboIh

title: Vinterviken Trädgård
description: Vinterviken is one of the most popular and central parks in Stockholm, give it a try! Read more at: vinterviken.com

title: Högdalstoppen
description: You can admire the view from the top of the hill at Högdalstoppen.

title: Stockholm Fishing Camp
description: What about fishing in the archipelago? Don't worry about bringing your equipment, you can rent it at Stockholm Fishing Camp! Read more at: stockholmfishingcamp.se

title: Stockholms Fallskärmsklubb
description: Are you brave enough to skydive? This requires a lot of courage and you can even brag about it after you've done it! Read more at: skydive.se

title: PV Cykeluthyrningen
description: If you'd like to ride a bike in the city of Stockholm but you don't have your own, why not rent it? Read more at: rentabike.se

title: Rooftop tour
description: Walking on the roofs in Stockholm? Is this true? Check on their website when the encounters will take place and join! Read more at: takvandring.com

title: Climb Stockholm highest peak
description: Vårbergstoppen south of Stockholm is an artificial hill with a peak of 90 meters above sea level, climb it for a really good view! Read more at: bit.ly/2egQRzC

title: Walk by the Sea in Tattby Nature reserve
description: Take a nice walk in the beautiful nature of Tattby nature reserve, go explore the little secret places and feel the sea brezee in your face! Read more at: bit.ly/2dorytq
